subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Kari Lehtonen returned to the lineup last night after missing 16 games and turned aside 33 shots for the Atlanta Thrashers in a 4-0 victory over the host Islanders.
snippet: Kari Lehtonen returned to the lineup last night after missing 16 games and turned aside 33 shots for the Atlanta Thrashers in a 4-0 victory over the host Islanders.
